summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1443, for the improvement of First Avenue South and First Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Weller Street to Virginia Street, by the installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb line on each side of said avenue, together with the installation of such poles, conduits and wires as may be necessary for the proper installation and equipment of said system, under Ordinance No. 15606, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
